core

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Employee
      • core.Agent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Rating

    public class Agent
extends Employee
implements Rating, java.io.Serializable
    Class Agent ~ represent the employee that responsible for order handling and produce flight tickets
    Author:
    Java Course Team 2014, University Of Haifa-Israel
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addOrder(Order order)
      The role of this method is to add a new order to the orders set
      double calcRating()
      This method calculate this Agent rating by the average cost of all orders (that have at least one flight order soars in the summer months) he handled * number of different customers made those orders
      int getNumberOfThisYearSummerAssignments()
      This method calculate the number of assignments (flight order to handle) this agent need/needed to handle with this summer months.

      int getPrimaryKey()

      The role of this method is to remove a order from the orders set

      This method set a new branch to this agent.
      java.lang.String theString()
      This method return a custom String to fit program display
